data.title: VERISIGN on LinkedIn: #engineering #techjobs
data.meta_description: From running the registry services for .com and .net to working to protect critical internet infrastructure that enables internet navigation, Verisign offers…
data.text:
In Q1 2024, the .com and .net TLDs had a combined total of 172.5 million registrations. Read more in the Q1 2024 DNIB Quarterly Report, out now. https://lnkd.in/eqzvHcxK

The internet had 362.4 million domain name registrations at the end of Q1 2024. Learn more in the latest Domain Name Industry Brief Quarterly Report, available now. https://vrsn.cc/60409NV4G

The Q1 2024 Domain Name Industry Brief Quarterly Report is now live. The internet had 362.4 million domain name registrations at the end of Q1 2024. Learn more: https://vrsn.cc/60449NT9i

For International Women In Engineering Day, we’re celebrating the achievements of women around the world whose contributions continue to propel our industry forward. #INWED24

From running the registry services for .com and .net to protecting critical internet infrastructure that enables internet navigation, Verisign offers exciting opportunities in tech. We’re hiring for a C++ Software Engineer. https://vrsn.cc/6042gpDUQ #Engineering #TechJobs

#ICYMI Verisign Fellow Scott Hollenbeck recently published a blog about our Shared Registration System & the journey it’s taken since 1999 when it was first deployed. Read the post to learn more about the impact of this technology: https://lnkd.in/eu2RS3G7

Verisign enables the world to connect online with reliability and confidence, anytime, anywhere. We have an opening for an International Tax Manager. Join our team today: http://spr.ly/60455KYTv #Jobs #Careers

Our mission and values are at the center of everything we do. Verisign celebrates the diversity of our employees and community with an emphasis on respect, integrity, and inclusion. #PrideMonth.
